name: Super Dude
description:
You play as the super dude on his quest to locate all the protein bars at the local gym.

Watch out for the bad dudes running around and see if you are able to locate

Arrows moves the dude, X to jump and C to shoot dumbbells or of thin air!! 

Did you find any bugs or have an idea for the game? Please let us know below ^^

Inspired by MegaMan
